page.title: 13CARCROFT MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: We have 7 teachers, there are 3 men and 4 ladies.There is a headmaster, secretary, 2 girls and some others who help us to bake and sew.We have maths books,reading books,library books,all sorts of books.We have drama lights in the hall with curtains half-way across the hall.At dinner time we all line up in a queue.We get a tray,cup, knife, fork and spoon.Then we put the tray on this bar and move along and keep stopping for a bit of food, and when you have got all of your dinner and pudding you go to a table. Put your dinner and pudding down and eat it.We make displays about nature, and on plants and other things....We start school 8.30a.m., and we finish at 3.15 p.m.We have play-time at 10.30 a.m. and dinner at 12.30 p.m....
